page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN GATESHEAD
page.content: (Old Fold is a district of Gateshead) In Old Fold there are many people { {unemployed}as there are all over the country. We asked St.Wilfrid's children about the people in their families. Of the ones that have jobs the most common are{factory workers, {caretakers, welders and abbatoir {workers}for fathers and brothers and { {barmaids, cleaners, shop assistants {and helpers in old peoples homes}for mothers and sisters. Not many children or women can get jobs at all. A lot of school leavers try for a place on a {youth training {scheme }which lasts for 6 months or a year.
